qas.question: How large is the budget of the IMSS?
What is the name of one of the great hospitals in Mexico City?
What is an organization that has a large presence in the city?
What is the name of a large facility run by the IMSS in Mexico City?

context: Mexico City is home to some of the best private hospitals in the country; <a1_0>Hospital Ángeles<a1_0/>, Hospital ABC and Médica Sur to name a few. The national public healthcare institution for private-sector employees, IMSS, has its largest facilities in Mexico City—including the <a3_0>National Medical Center<a3_0/> and the La Raza Medical Center—and has an annual budget of <a0_0>over 6 billion pesos<a0_0/>. The IMSS and other public health institutions, including the ISSSTE (Public Sector Employees' Social Security Institute) and the <a2_0>National Health Ministry (SSA)<a2_0/> maintain large specialty facilities in the city. These include the National Institutes of Cardiology, Nutrition, Psychiatry, Oncology, Pediatrics, Rehabilitation, among others.
